account_types.label: Checking
account_types.description: A checking account is a deposit account that allows for withdrawals and deposits, typically used for daily transactions.

account_types.label: Investment
account_types.description: An investment account is used to hold securities such as stocks, bonds, and mutual funds, allowing for growth of capital over time.

account_types.label: Savings
account_types.description: A savings account is a deposit account that earns interest on the balance and is typically used for short-term savings goals.

account_types.label: Credit
account_types.description: A credit account allows users to borrow funds up to a certain limit, which must be repaid with interest over time.
